description: Specifications: This ring is made of high quality alloy material so it is durable and reliable for you to wear. What's more, it is featured with unique crown shape deign which makes it look very fashionable and attractive. It is suitable for wedding party, engagement party and daily life wearing.  Item Name: Ring Gender: Women's Style: Fashion Material: Alloy Occasion: Wedding, Party, Engagement, Gift, Anniversary, Proposal Features: Crown Shape, Finger Jewelry, Fine Workmanship Size Details: US Size 5(Dia): 15.7mm/0.62" (Approx.)
